name: BootlegMon
description:
Battle and evolve your BootlegMon!!!

Game made in 3h, your only options are attack or run (change enemy).

Every 5 levels your BootlegMon should "evolve", but so far I couldn't get it to level 5 :( It definitely needs some adjustments, feel free to dig into code here:  https://github.com/janisskuja/trijam_bootlegmon
